DOC.brief_summary: Children will be recruited from the pediatric dentistry clinic of Marquette University at their first or recall appointment and will be asked to fill a questionnaire regarding their dietary habits. Afterwards a dietary analysis will be performed using a computer software, developed for this study and dietary instructions will be given to the children.
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Analysis for Caries Prevention in Children Using a Computer Software
DOC.criteria: Free medical history Informed Consent General disease
